titleStmt.title: The visions of the soul, before it comes into the body in several dialogues / written by a member of the Anthenian Society.
titleStmt.author: Dunton, John, 1659-1733.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Pages 40-65 from Bodleian Library copy spliced at end.
Attributed to John Dunton. cf. Nicholl, A., A history of English drama, 1600-1900, 1961. v. 1, p. 48.
